author: sky.cactus
content: Why can't I sign-in with GitHub on https://notes.ethereum.org anymore (not sure where the right channel to ask about this is)?

author: sky.cactus
content: Looks like I cannot sign in with Google (SAML) either.

author: sky.cactus
content: I have used the site previously, so I'm not sure what changed.

author: hsiaowei
content:
(I've DM'd <@!301186049323958275>)
Recently, EF/HackMD team is updating the permission setting due to the license limits.
It should have been (1) automatically allowing users under EF GitHub organization (2) admin can manually add external users to the whitelist. 

However, it was misconfigured so that everyone could sign up for a long time...

I just reported to HackMD that notes.ethereum.org should not disallow all external users suddenly. i.e., some existing posts owners should be enabled.

It's indeed not an ACD channel topic. For the recent notes.ethereum.org issues, currently you can report to support@hackmd.io. But I'd suggest that maybe we open a GitHub `notes-support` repo for it? /cc <@!250259755484839957>
